name: Buccaneer's Beak
description:
Rumors of a treasure? The ol'Captain says it's pretty cool! Maybe a sailing adventure is in good order...

Sail the open seas and find out what this hidden treasure is all about! Meet the quirky characters and enjoy a relaxing trip across pleasant waters! Ahoy!

Created for LDG Jam 2023, with the theme 'treasure'!

Credits for assets used: https://github.com/cgsdev0/ldg-jam-2023/blob/main/credits.txt
